original_text: The living things all stood under the roof. Each of them stood with its wings held out towards the living things on each side of it. They covered their bodies with their other two wings.
korean_text: 그 궁창 밑에 생물들의 날개가 서로 향하여 펴 있는데 이 생물은 두 날개로 몸을 가렸고 저 생물도 두 날개로 몸을 가렸더라

sentences.original_text: The living things all stood under the roof
sentences.korean_translation: 생물들이 모두 지붕 아래에 서 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: Each of them stood with its wings held out
sentences.korean_translation: 각각은 날개를 펼친 채 서 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: towards the living things on each side of it
sentences.korean_translation: 자신의 양옆에 있는 다른 생물들을 향해
